fixes.name: Rank Stocks
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau's RANK(SUM([Volume])) is a table calculation over the aggregation of Volume. In DAX this is implemented with RANKX over the full set of rows (ALL('stock_data+')) and the aggregated expression CALCULATE(SUM('stock_data+'[Volume])). DESC is used so the highest volume ranks 1, matching Tableau's ranking behavior.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses an aggregation (SUM) and a table calculation (RANK), so it must be created as a measure.
